text: The IHC staining for <extra_id_0> TLR4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> was performed as described previously [ 8 ] .
The primary antibody employed was rabbit anti-TLR4 ( WuHan , BA1717 ) .

The biotinylated secondary antibody and antibody-biotin - <extra_id_0> avidin <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - peroxidase complexes ( ABC reagent , SC-2018 ) were obtained from Santa Cruz Biotechnology Inc . ( Santa Cruz , CA ) .
Slides processed without primary antibodies served as negative controls .
